title: Virtual pub quiz: How to run one that's actually good
description: Eggheads quizmaster Jeremy Vine is here to improve your quizzing.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
"We used Zoom for meetings anyway. So now I've got the flipchart out and we're doing Trivial Pursuit on it as well."
Jess Southworth works in sales for a hotel in Manchester. But lately, she says, "I've sort of turned into a virt… [+3590 chars]
